name: BFI-COIN
description: Bfic Protocol is a decentralized network that allows anyone to invoice a payment for which the recipient can pay in a secure way. All the information is stored in a decentralized authentic ledger, this results in cheaper, easier, and more secure payments along with it allows for a wide range of automation possibilities. To become the backbone of world trade, Bfic Protocol integrates a general ledger (in the accounting sense of the term), which are: Universal because it is designed to support 100% of global transactions, regardless of currency, legislation or language.
